citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available for inspection from 10 AM to 10:30 AM on Tuesday 16 April 2024. During this time,
inspector waited at the facility, knocked on doors, and called phone number on file leaving a message.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Catherine Beckwith, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
Jeffrey Shepherd, Assistant DirectorEnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available for inspection from 10 AM to 10:30 AM on Tuesday 16 April 2024. During this time, 
inspector waited at the facility, knocked on doors, and called phone number on file leaving a message.  
 
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Catherine Beckwith, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist 
Jeffrey Shepherd, Assistant DirectorEnd Section
